column4: hi i am sorry i am a newbie and when i try to install openssl i get an error: make: *** [build_apps] Error 1
how do you try to install ssh?
you try to compile it on your own?
why not just use the packages provided by your distro?
and then sth like apt-get install openssl
beli:ok thx and i tried like to learn

what you are trying to do is to compile it from source....thats ok...but you need to know what configure options to provide and where apps/libs take place in your distro....and i guess you dont know that so far
ok it says it is installed
now i try to install aircrack
read the introductional manual of ubuntu...you are trying to do thinks you really dont understand so far
ok thx i will go read it sorrry
